name: Elliott Tercorien

topics.topic_text: Get a move on it!
topics.response_text: Yes sir.Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeinte_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgeinte_000058c8_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What have you got there?
topics.response_text: Oh man, I don't know... a teleport jammer, maybe? Right, space ships have those, don't they?Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_000058c5_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: How's the jammer holding?
topics.response_text: It's holding fine for now, I guess.  It should help with the bastards teleporting onto the ship.Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_000058c6_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Do you think you can make use of that stuff you picked up in the Cryo Labs?
topics.response_text: Yeah, I think so. Before I was shipped out to Anchorage, I was trained in cryoscience. We were hoping to apply that to medicine.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00007566_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Do you think you'll be able to assist us medically if we need it?
topics.response_text: I'd really like to, but when I woke up on this ship for the first time all of my medical gear was gone.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtlterc_000055f5_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: How long can they last if you revive them?
topics.response_text: I don't know for certain. I can get them on their feet and moving for maybe a few minutes at best.Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c0f_2.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: We should just put them out of their misery.
topics.response_text: Yeah, I was considering that too. We can't let the aliens experiment on them any more. It just isn't right.Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c09_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: We should just leave them here. It's too late for them.
topics.response_text: Well, we have to do something! We can't just leave them in there like some sort of a lab rat to get poked and prodded and cut open!Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e57_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I think I've decided what we should do.
topics.response_text: Thanks. I'm really not sure what's best for them. What did you decide?Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e58_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: We have an objective, soldier! We leave immediately.
topics.response_text: I... I guess you're right. Let's get the fuck out of here.{choking back anger}Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c03_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: End it... put them out of their misery.
topics.response_text: I suppose you're right. Don't worry, they won't feel a thing.Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c06_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Revive them and let them fight with us.
topics.response_text: Just remember they won't be alive long so we need to keep moving as fast as we can.Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c01_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Let me ask you something before I decide.
topics.response_text: All right. What is it?Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c05_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Dlc05CryoElliotGreet01
topics.response_text: I don't know what to do. These guys are the last of my squad... they're my friends.Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c04_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Dlc05CryoElliotMadAtPlayer
topics.response_text: I had no choice... I.. I had to do it. You saw. They would have killed us. Damn it!Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006dad_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Why are we stuck inside the laboratory?
topics.response_text: I think when we opened the door to the operating room we set off some kind of containment alarm.Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006e54_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: It's okay, we're not going to hurt you... We're friends.
topics.response_text: What? I've never seen any of you before in my life. Last people I saw were... oh my god!{sudden realization at the end (long pause before it).}Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003982_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Your uniform... it looks familiar, but I can't place it.
topics.response_text: My what? Who the hell are you... oh my god.... wait a minute!{sudden realization at the end}Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003997_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You're a prisoner like the rest of us.
topics.response_text: Prisoner? Last thing I remember I was being outside our bunker and then... oh my god!{sudden realization at the end (long pause before it).}Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003967_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I can promise you I am not an alien. In fact, I was abducted like you.
topics.response_text: I dunno, I dunno... maybe you assumed human form. I heard they could do that... or you are human but they took over your mind!Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000396f_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You're a doctor and you can't tell from looking at me that I'm no alien?
topics.response_text: Hey, you could be one of those little green guys in human form... or maybe you ARE human and they just took over your mind.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000398d_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Do I look like an alien?
topics.response_text: Ha! That doesn't mean anything!Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000396e_2.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: If I were with the aliens, the last thing I would have done is release you.
topics.response_text: I... I suppose so.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003983_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I promise you, all I want to do is get off this ship and get back home.
topics.response_text: You do? Then you're telling me the truth. Those... aliens took you too.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003966_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Fine... I'll just put you back in stasis!
topics.response_text: No! Please don't. It's horrible in there! To think I was just sitting there, frozen like that... I thought I was dead!Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003975_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I'm afraid not. All I've found are these people.
topics.response_text: Oh my god, I'm responsible for them and now they're lost... or dead.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003961_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Nope.
topics.response_text: What if they're lost... or frozen like I was... or even dead? I'm responsible for them!Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003972_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: My guess is the aliens had them for a snack... or worse.
topics.response_text: No... no. I'm responsible for those men. They were my team.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000398f_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Don't worry, we ARE in this together, and I will help you.
topics.response_text: Thank you. Thanks so much. Sorry about all this... I just can't believe this is happening.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_0000396c_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Just relax. Let me see what I can do.
topics.response_text: Okay... okay. Whew.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003962_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I swear, if you don't calm down, I'll stuff you back in the freezer!
topics.response_text: No, no! Don't do it... don't do it.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tercorien_00003979_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Tell me how you were captured by these aliens.
topics.response_text: Well, it was getting dark... we had spent the day out in the trenches keeping as many of the guys alive as we could.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlabducte_00003977_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What do you think the aliens want with us?
topics.response_text: Isn't it obvious? They're probably using us as guinea pigs, examining our anatomy.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlalienin_0000ab99_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Can you tell me more about where you're from?
topics.response_text: Me? Well, I was a medic with the 108th Infantry Battalion stationed at Anchorage, Alaska.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlbackgro_00003971_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I need some help in the Robot Assembly area. You in?
topics.response_text: Never was really good with those tin cans. I deal with blood and guts better than wires and gizmos. That's why I became a doctor.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpass_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpass_00003998_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I need to get through the Cryo Labs. Think you can help me?
topics.response_text: What's the point? You already did a good bit of the place. Nah... I'll just stay here and guard the Engine Core.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpcry_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelpcry_00003994_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I may need an extra gun in the Hangar Bay. Can you lend a hand?
topics.response_text: Gun? No thanks. I've spent enough time patching up the mess that guns make. I'm no killer.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelphan_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlhelphan_00003990_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You think anything in here can prove useful?
topics.response_text: Well, the cryogenics compound I found will help already, but keep your eyes open for anything else.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelhe_00008…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tllevelhe_00008ab8_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I think you should remain in the Engineering Core for now.
topics.response_text: Okay. Whatever you think is best.Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlnevermi_00003…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlnevermi_0000398a_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Where's that Kago guy?
topics.response_text: Uhh... it wasn't my turn to watch him?Play soundDlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz2_dlc05mz2tlsamurai_00007a66_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You think it was some sort of weapon?
topics.response_text: How the hell do I know? It sure looked like it!Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076b3_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I have no idea what he said, but he sounded pretty angry.
topics.response_text: You think? What clued you in?Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_0000a717_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: We need to find out what that was, and put a stop to it.
topics.response_text: Yeah, no kidding. Wow, they've gotta be really pissed at us.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_00007…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3greetdeat_000076bb_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Thanks for your help. Couldn't have done it without you.
topics.response_text: Aw, come on. We both know you could have.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05postgreet1_0000a9…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05postgreet1_0000a98a_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: What will you do now?
topics.response_text: I don't know... I don't really have a place down there anymore, do I? Doesn't sound like it'd suit me very well.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a9…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05postgreet2_0000a985_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: You think they'll ever come back?
topics.response_text: Boy, I sure hope not. But at least we know what to do with them, right?Play soundDlc05post_dlc05postgreet3_0000a9…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05postgreet3_0000a984_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I could use some more of these alien weapons. Got any?
topics.response_text: Yep, sure thing!Play soundDlc05post_dlc05pqtlweapon_0000ab…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05pqtlweapon_0000ab58_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Where's Paulson?
topics.response_text: He took off just after you did. Said there was no reason for him to hang around here, that he might as well go see what it was like down there.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05pqtlwherepa_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05pqtlwherepa_0000abf6_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Dlc05TercorienHolo1
topics.response_text: Oh shit, oh shit, oh shit, oh shit...Play soundDlc05gener_dlc05tercorienh_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05gener_dlc05tercorienh_0000a883_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Why can't I use the door to get off the bridge?
topics.response_text: I bet it's a safety mechanism, designed to seal off damaged areas of the ship. At least, that's what I'd do if I were designing a spaceship.Play soundDlc05post_dlc05tlbridgedoo_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_dlc05tlbridgedoo_0000abf3_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Sir?Play soundDlc05bridgeld_greeting_000058c4_…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridgeld_greeting_000058c4_1.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: SpeechChallengeFailure
topics.response_text: No. No, it's not right. I am NOT just leaving them here to their fate. I couldn't do that back in Anchorage, and I am not doing it now.Play soundDlc05cryoq_speechchallenge_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_speechchallenge_00006e53_1.oggnoicon

conversation.response_text: This is just like the last time.Play soundDlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05bridg_dlc05bridgetopi_0000a99a_1.oggnoicon

Hey look, Giddyup Buttercups! All the rich kids had them.  Waste of money if you ask me.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099e0_1.oggnoicon
Look, even more of them.  Buttercups that is.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099e2_1.oggnoicon
OK, this is getting a little ridiculous now.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d9_1.oggnoicon
Oh wow. I remember these posters plastered all over the place back home.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099de_1.oggnoicon
What are they doing to the Buttercups?Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099db_1.oggnoicon

Our situation didn't get any better by the looks of what happened here. I say we get the hell out of here.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_000099d5_1.oggnoicon

Well, that's one way to take out the garbage.{Commenting on an extremely large trash chute found in the cargo hold.}Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009c78_1.oggnoicon

Nuka-Cola! You know, they came out with this stuff called Nuka-Cola Quantum way back. Now that was some powerful stuff. I can still taste it now.{Tercorien commenting on Nuka bottles, nuka cola machine.}Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convcargo0_00009c75_1.oggnoicon
What is that thing?Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05converoome_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_000098fc_1.oggnoicon
They're trying to gas us again.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05converoome_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_000098ff_1.oggnoicon
Grab some of that epoxy, our weapons could use the field repair.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05converoome_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05converoome_00009905_1.oggnoicon
This place is filthy.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05converoomf_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05converoomf_00009908_1.oggnoicon
Those guys in there look busy.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05converoomf_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05converoomf_00009902_1.oggnoicon
They're flooding the room with gas.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05converoomg_00009…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05converoomg_0000990b_1.oggnoicon
So they don't know who started it or who won?Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_000053ee_1.oggnoicon

Then I don't really have anything to go back to, do I? I mean, my family's gone, my friends are gone... everything I knew is gone.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005401_1.oggnoicon

Yeah... all the time. I was a doctor, so it was my job to try and make everyone feel better.Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_0000542c_1.oggnoicon

Well... I mean... sometimes they're hurt so bad, there's nothing I can do. The human body is very hard to, um, hard to "fix."{trying to reason with a child}Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_000053f0_1.oggnoicon

No, no, no. Don't worry. Nothing's going to happen to you. Everything's going to be just fine.{Trying to divert subject}Play soundDlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05conve_dlc05convtercor_00005410_1.oggnoicon

Heâ€™s not going anywhere. Why donâ€™t we just hold on to him, and try to negotiate? Yâ€™know, like a hostage?{about a near dying alien captive}Play soundDlc05cores_dlc05corescene0_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cores_dlc05corescene0_00006e1a_1.oggnoicon

I donâ€™t know, but maybe we should... there must be something...{coming up short for a good argument in his favor}Play soundDlc05cores_dlc05corescene0_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cores_dlc05corescene0_00006e1b_1.oggnoicon
What the hell are you doing?! Don't press that!Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00006c0b_1.oggnoicon

Wait!  I think that's some more of my squad!{Notices that the actors in the pods are his squad mates.}Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_0000561c_1.oggnoicon

What the hell are those aliens doing in there?{Responding to seeing Aliens, through a window, patrolling a room and monitoring something.}Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoelliot_00005612_1.oggnoicon

Hmmm. Let me take some of this cryogenic compound back to the engine core. I might be able to make some use of it.Play soundDlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoweapon_00006…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05cryoq_dlc05cryoweapon_00006e56_1.oggnoicon
Pretty effective threat, if you ask me.Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabdeat_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabdeat_00005d39_1.oggnoicon

That's really something. Almost enough to make you forget we're running for our lives up here...{awed}Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_000058a8_1.oggnoicon
Get a load of this!{amazed}Play soundDlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00005…https://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05mz3_dlc05mz3exlabscen_00005741_1.oggnoicon
Yep, not like I'm going anywhere.Play soundDlc05post_goodbye_0000ab68_1.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_goodbye_0000ab68_1.oggnoicon
Hey, good to see you again.Play soundDlc05post_hello_0000ab54_1.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:Dlc05post_hello_0000ab54_1.oggnoicon

description:
Elliott Tercorien is a 25 year-old Caucasian Male.

A pre-War medical doctor who was abducted by aliens in 2077 and kept in stasia for two centuries. He combines exceptional medical and technical skills with a profound naivete about the post-Wasteland world.

Elliott Tercorien's Personality: Analytical and methodical, Elliott approaches problems with the logical precision of a trained physician. He is deeply loyal to his military unit and carries a heavy burden of survivor's guilt. Despite his medical expertise, he struggles with social interactions and prefers to focus on his work. He abhors violence but will defend himself or others when necessary, particularly if his comrades are threatened. His time in stasia has left him with a childlike wonder about the modern world, tempered by the trauma of witnessing alien experimentation.

Elliott Tercorien's Backstory: Elliott Tercorien pursued medicine before the Great War, believing he was better suited to treat 'blood and guts' rather than 'wires and gizmos.' He joined the U.S. Army in 2076 and was deployed to Anchorage, Alaska, as a medic with the 108th Infantry Battalion. In December 2077, during the Battle of Anchorage, he was abducted by aliens along with his medical team. They were taken while resting in a bunker after a day of treating wounded soldiers under constant artillery fire. Elliott remained in stasia for exactly 200 years, only awakening in 2277 aboard an alien spacecraft. His sudden emergence into the post-War world has left him disoriented but determined to find out what happened to his squad.
